page.title: 05JESMOND DENE - PART TWO
page.content:
In the heart of the Dene is fisherman's Lodge which is placed conveniently next to the river (noted for its cuisine). Near Pets' Corner is Coleman's Field, a graveyard for pets which is frequently visited by their former owners. Paddy Freemans is an area with a mini lake, play area, football pitches, bowling green, tennis courts and rugby pitches. There is a History Trail and Nature Trail. The Dene recently celebrated its 100th birthday and there is a Centenary House at Pets' Corner giving leaflets etc.
The Dene is a welcome break to the city centre and is used by joggers and dog walkers and is very popular.
